trans-unit.source: Represents a group of related sections within a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en gruppe med relaterte inndelinger i en konfigurasjonsfil.

trans-unit.source: Settings in configuration files (such as the Web.config file) are organized into sections.
trans-unit.target: Innstillinger i konfigurasjonsfiler (for eksempel Web.config-filen) er ordnet i deler.

trans-unit.source: Because some sections are related, it is often convenient to group them in a section group.
trans-unit.target: Fordi noen inndelinger er relatert, er det ofte nyttig å gruppere dem i en delgruppe.

trans-unit.source: The ConfigurationSectionGroup class represents the `sectionGroup` XML element that is used to group sections when they are defined in the `configSections` element of a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: ConfigurationSectionGroup klassen representerer den `sectionGroup` XML-elementet som brukes til gruppedeler når de er definert i den `configSections` element i en konfigurasjonsfil.

trans-unit.source: Section groups can be nested (a section group can contain other section groups as well as sections).
trans-unit.target: Delen grupper kan nestes (en delgruppe kan inneholde andre grupper delen samt deler).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a `configSections` element that defines three nested section groups: ``` <configSections> <sectionGroup name="system.web.extensions"...> <sectionGroup name="scripting" ...> <section name="scriptResourceHandler".../> <sectionGroup name="webServices"...> <section name="jsonSerialization" .../> <section name="profileService" ... /> <section name="authenticationService" .../> <section name="roleService" .../> </sectionGroup> </sectionGroup> </sectionGroup> </configSections> ``` The configuration system loads settings from configuration files into ConfigurationSectionGroup objects.
trans-unit.target: I dette eksemplet en `configSections` element som definerer tre nestede grupper: ``` <configSections> <sectionGroup name="system.web.extensions"...> <sectionGroup name="scripting" ...> <section name="scriptResourceHandler".../> <sectionGroup name="webServices"...> <section name="jsonSerialization" .../> <section name="profileService" ... /> <section name="authenticationService" .../> <section name="roleService" .../> </sectionGroup> </sectionGroup> </sectionGroup> </configSections> ``` Konfigurasjonssystemet laster inn innstillinger fra konfigurasjonsfiler i ConfigurationSectionGroup objekter.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.Sections%2A> and <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.SectionGroups%2A> properties to access the sections and section groups that are contained in a ConfigurationSectionGroup object.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.Sections%2A>og <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.SectionGroups%2A>Egenskaper for å få tilgang til inndelinger og delen grupper som finnes i et ConfigurationSectionGroup-objekt.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.SectionGroups%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.Sections%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to access information from configuration files, see the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager> class.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om hvordan du tilgang til informasjon fra konfigurasjonsfiler, kan du se <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager>klasse.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Forces the declaration for this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Tvinger deklarasjonen for denne <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The ForceDeclaration method can force a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> object to be written to a configuration file, even if it is not required because it is already declared in a parent file.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ForceDeclaration kan fremtvinge en <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>objekt skrives til en konfigurasjonsfil, selv om det ikke er påkrevd fordi den allerede er deklarert i en overordnede filen.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>

trans-unit.source: Forces the declaration for this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Tvinger deklarasjonen for denne <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.ForceDeclaration%2A> method forces this <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> declaration to be written to the file if `force` is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.ForceDeclaration%2A>metoden tvinger dette <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>deklarasjon skriving til filen hvis `force` er `true`.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> </xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.ForceDeclaration%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `force` is `false`, this action might be ignored if the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> object is required by the system.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `force` er `false`, denne handlingen kan ignoreres hvis det <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>objektet kreves av systemet.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>

trans-unit.source: The ForceDeclaration method can force a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> object to be written to a configuration file, even if it is not required because it is already declared in a parent file.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ForceDeclaration kan fremtvinge en <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>objekt skrives til en konfigurasjonsfil, selv om det ikke er påkrevd fordi den allerede er deklarert i en overordnede filen.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>

trans-unit.source: Also, it can remove a group from a configuration file if the group is not required.
trans-unit.target: Det kan også fjerne en gruppe fra en konfigurasjonsfil Hvis gruppen ikke er obligatorisk.

trans-unit.source: You might want to use the ForceDeclaration method to make a configuration file more portable from one computer to another, without worrying about whether the group declaration already exists.
trans-unit.target: Du bør bruke ForceDeclaration-metoden til å opprette en konfigurasjonsfil mer flyttbar fra én datamaskin til en annen, uten å bekymre om gruppedeklarasjonen allerede finnes.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object must be written to the file; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objektet må være skrevet til filen; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object declaration is required.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om dette <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> deklarasjon av objekt er nødvendig.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> declaration is required; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> deklarasjonen er obligatorisk; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object is declared.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om dette <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objektet er deklarert.

trans-unit.source: If the section group is declared in the configuration file, the IsDeclared property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis delgruppen er deklarert i konfigurasjonsfilen, returnerer egenskapen IsDeclared `true`.

trans-unit.source: The IsDeclared property returns `false` if this section is inherited from Machine.config or a parent configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer IsDeclared `false` Hvis denne delen er arvet fra Machine.config eller en konfigurasjonsfil for overordnede.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> is declared; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> er deklarert; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name property of this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter name-egenskapen for dette <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The Name property value is the name of the section group that does not contain the parent section groups.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på egenskapsverdien er navnet på delgruppe som ikke inneholder overordnede delen grupper.

trans-unit.source: The name property of this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Name-egenskapen for dette <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the section group name associated with this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter gruppenavnet for delen knyttet til dette <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The SectionGroupName property value is the full path name of the section group, including the parent section groups..
trans-unit.target: Egenskapsverdien SectionGroupName er det fullstendige banenavnet av gruppen delen overordnede delen grupper...

trans-unit.source: The section group name of this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Delen gruppenavnet på dette <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object that contains all the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> objects that are children of this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"> </xref> objekt som inneholder alle de <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objekter som underordnede av dette <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object that contains all the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> objects that are children of this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"> </xref> objekt som inneholder alle de <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objekter som underordnede av dette <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object that contains all of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> objects within this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> objektet som inneholder alle <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> objekter i denne <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object that contains all the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> objects within this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> objekt som inneholder alle de <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> objekter i denne <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the current <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> instance should be serialized when the configuration object hierarchy is serialized for the specified target version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Angir om gjeldende <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> forekomsten skal serialiseres når objektet konfigurasjonshierarkiet er serialisert for angitt mål-versjonen av [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Each configuration section group that is created for the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] and later versions must explicitly override this method and return `true`, but only if the section group is valid for the specified version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Hver delgruppe for konfigurasjonen som er opprettet for den [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] og nyere versjoner må eksplisitt overstyre denne metoden returnere `true`, men bare hvis delgruppen er gyldig for den angitte versjonen av den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Existing configuration section groups that were created for earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] do not have to be changed.
trans-unit.target: Eksisterende konfigurasjon delen grupper som ble opprettet for tidligere versjoner av den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] har ikke endres.

trans-unit.source: The base type contains a default implementation of this method that always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Basistypen inneholder en standard implementering av denne metoden returnerer alltid `true`.

trans-unit.source: In other words, if a configuration section group implementer does not override this method, by default the configuration section group will be serialized for all framework versions.
trans-unit.target: Med andre ord, hvis en konfigurasjon delen gruppen implementer ikke overstyre denne metoden, skal som standard delen konfigurasjonsgruppen serialiseres for alle framework-versjonene.

trans-unit.source: The target version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Target-versjonen av den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current section group should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den gjeldende delgruppen skal serialiseres; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type for this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir typen for dette <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: If this instance of the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> class is a derived type, the Type property will return the name of the derived type that extends the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> class.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne forekomsten av <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>klassen er en avledet type, Type-egenskapen, tilbakestiller navnet på den utledede typen som utvider <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>klasse.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> </xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>

trans-unit.source: The type of this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Hva slags dette <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The section or group is already defined at another level.
trans-unit.target: Del- eller gruppenavnet er allerede definert i en annen nivå.
